creator: yqwu@mail.etonenet.com
text:
I have several web applications using commons-digester. So I want to
move commons-digester.jar to common\lib. But at bootup it report
java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: org.apache.catalina.core.StandardServer
when digester.jar exists in both common\lib and server\lib or only in
common\lib.

I have checked Digester document and found 2 method related to classloader.
So maybe need add somehing in org/apache/catalina/startup/Catalina.java?

creator: remm@apache.org
text:
No, you cannot do that because of the CL hierarchy (common/lib delegates to
server/lib, and server/lib doesn't have the appropriate classes). BTW, BZ is not
meant for asking user questions, but for reporting bugs.
